Scarlet flower
Scarlet flowers in the zone appear extremely rarely. They appear in radioactive and rusty technique, paradoxically they themselves do not absorb this radiation. In a sense, they are a "panacea".
A set of herbs
Several herbs, mushrooms and other things for a missionary.
Panacea
Remedy for everything.
Plush
Unknown device from Plush. Takes strange signals in different parts of the zone.
Moonshine
Moonshine. Closed quite tightly.
PDA miserable
Judging by the notes, the missionary fell ill with a "landfill ration." To create a medicine, the doctor from the farm needs herbs that are in the hogly cache, and the Scarlet Flower.
PDA scientist
Incomprehensible notes. The CPC is engraved by Irididius and depicts a symbol of the laboratory of the same name.%C [255,0,255,0] \ n [can be used]
Notebook
Notepad with interesting drawings.%C [255,0,255,0] \ n [can be used]
Graphic tablet
Case with a graphic tablet with a whole set of periphery, including an adapter for the CCP. Unfortunately, you do not know how to draw yourself.
CPC Condor
Last entry:%C [255,0,255.0] \ n "My friends are waiting ... I have to meet with them that night ... again ..." again ... "
Key
Key. Presumably from the house in the village of Novichkov.
Strange book
A book with various stories about supernatural and mythological creatures.
"Sapphire" (inactive)
Blue artifact, called sapphire. Presumably adds endurance to the carrier.
"Rubin" (inactive)
Red artifact called ruby. Presumably heals the carrier.
"Sapphire"
Blue artifact, as if almost in zero gravity. Slightly increases the transferred weight of the owner, and also significantly increases his endurance.
"Ruby"
Red artifact, which seems to pulsate. Significantly increases the survivability of the owner and accelerates the healing of wounds.
Strange "moonlight"
The artifact, outwardly similar to the "moonlight", but its properties are unknown.
Strange note

%C [255,0,255.0] I remember once in a restaurant. I looked at \ N %C [255,0,0,125,255] menu %C [255,0,255.0], and there, in addition to normal food, some strange points: \ N %C [255,0,0,125,255] “KILL”%C [255,0,255.0],%C [255,0,0,125,255] “CAT”%C [255,0,255.0] and some other ... \ n name, whether%C [255,0,125.2555] owner of the restaurant%C [255.0.255.0], Either \ n %C [255,0,125,255] chefs of %C [255,0,255.0] I do not remember for sure.
A note of the unknown
%C [255,0,255.0] "Refrigerator in one of the cellars of the village. Code from the castle - 4145."
A note from the refrigerator
%C [255,0,255,0] "We will meet in the sewage of the destroyed farm."
The first commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "... And the Lord was angry, seeing how humanity was mired in sin. People from His temples turned away, from His servants, from his old instructions. People opened the gates into new temples, and sewn up from these temples, stained the earth, soaked it with poison. \ n \ n saw a god God bewilder to see that they deserve the suffering with their embezzlement.
The second commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "The zone is not a place for disclosure and old. The zone is not subject to destruction. The zone is an eternal temple, a blow of the beach of God on the body of mankind. A trace of this will remain from the blow of this, and when the last judgment comes to which everything will be called up: both living and dead ... \ n \ n The zone will remain the only temple in which the atonement will be found at the reduction Sinners.
The third commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "Three times rejected, three times persecuted, three times devoted to people, but never devoted to the Lord - that was him, the word he was hearing, he saw the Epistle of God. One reinforced, surrounded by the casts. One came to the zone, but inspired many by himself. Their! ”He told him. And he plunged the world into suffering.”
The fourth commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "warned them with the metropolitan that everyone will come, convened by the devil at the feast. The first will be fanatics blinded by the will of the devil and take it for God's will. They will be followed by the Costacea, along the roads will pass through their own greed. The latter will be released. False Messiahs that declare the zone with a threat and wished to destroy it and said the Lord: \ n \ n "On the bunches of my anger, each of them deserves, trim at them, like a scourge."
The fifth commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "There are no values ​​of others other than the value of your faith, your fraternity and your suffering. There are no values ​​of others except the words of God who come to you from the lips of the Metropolitan. There are no values ​​of others, but the newly new, but the newfound! And he said: \ n \ N" Drive away from the fact that you call it with artifacts - Make them sacrifice to my altar. "\ n and plunged the world into suffering."
The sixth commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "You should become your brothers, you will become a support for the Metropolitan's teaching, but the main thing is to seek a support in your own suffering. Strive to divide it with your brothers, carry your suffering into the world. \ n \ n like your deed of God's deed, because it brought the zone as a gift and as a gift; Bring other people suffering, bring him exactly like the Lord, so that you are cursed and blessed by you: for he said: \ n \ n "I brought a common fate to you. Break it together, spill both tears and blood together. "\ N and plunged the world into suffering."
The seventh commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "called blessed, do not see the whim at all. The Lord sent a separate punishment, a terrible punishment for sins. Those who listened to the call of the zone, but not into the call of the Lord, are destined to follow this damned call. Their ears and their minds will no longer hear their minds. \ n \ n, only the metropolitan can return They, give them hope for them. False light is worse than darkness, and you are destined to extinguish it. "\ N and plunged the world into suffering."
The eighth commandment of the Metropolitan

%C [255,0,255.0] "... So there is suffering? Your suffering is more than pain. Your suffering means more than atonement. Your suffering is a conscious opposition to the world, for the world is immersed in temptation and vice, the world is tempting to renounce suffering and live in sin, and the world suffers in sin, although this is hiding. Our sins, and only in suffering we bring ourselves to righteousness. Do not survive the suffering, of which you would be unworthy. "\ N and plunged the world into suffering."
Lighter
Just a lighter. It seems new and complete.
Strange artifact
Green artifact found on a checkpoint.
Posts of the boss
Collection of records of the head of the department. Apparently, there are no several pages.
